alert.note: Alert for Aguadilla; Arecibo; Camuy; Hatillo; Isabela; Lares; Moca; Quebradillas; San Sebastian (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 2:15PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Aguadilla, Arecibo, Camuy, Hatillo, Isabela, Lares, Moca, Quebradillas and San Sebastian. * WHEN...Until 500 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 214 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arecibo, Lares, Quebradillas, Camuy, Hatillo, San Sebastian, Isabela, Moca, Aguadilla, Rafael Capo, Rafael Gonzalez, Hato Arriba, Aceitunas, Bajadero, Caban, San Antonio, La Alianza, Piedra Gorda, Quebrada and Cacao. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Aguadilla; Arecibo; Camuy; Hatillo; Isabela; Lares; Moca; Quebradillas; San Sebastian
